website_summaries.verdict: Well-made toe separators by a trusted brand; though others work just as well or better with more precise fits and come at lower price points.
pros: Patented design made of medical-grade gel
Helps relieve pain from numerous foot issues, including hammer toes and bunions
cons: Material is stiff at first, and requires a break-in period

customer_reviews.title: Undid 2inside bunion and a hammer toe with Yogatoes!
customer_reviews.text: Undid 2 bunion and a hammer toe with my Yogatoes. I just wore them as I sat in my easy chair watching tv or reading. It took 8months but it took a long time for the bunion and hammer toe to develop also. It sure beats the pain and expense of surgery!
customer_reviews.author: Ramona J Sutter

customer_reviews.title: Good Stretch for the Toes
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. We bought the YogaToes Gems a while back... they worked okay, but did not provide as much space in between the toes that this model offers. Remember, if you have a moderate or severe Hammer Toe or Bunion, this will not cure it, but it does offer a positive stretch for the toes. It's best to stay off your feet with these. Do NOT walk with them, because you could lose your balance.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Yoga toes
customer_reviews.text: I really like the way they feel when you first put them on. Instructions say to keep on for 10 mins. and that night I had cramps in my feet so I think if you use them start with a shorter period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet extremely effective
customer_reviews.text: This is actually my second purchase of the product; I first bought them over ten years ago and am only replacing them because my dog chewed on the old ones. I suffer intermittently from plantar fasciitis and neuromas, and using this simple product a few times a week has done wonders in alleviating my symptoms and relapse.
customer_reviews.author: orangebadgers

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I love yoga toes! These are amazing and they feel so great on my feet. Every night I come home and I put them on my toes for 10 minutes. At first I wasn't able to keep them on that long, because they hurt. But it wasn't a problem once I got used to them.
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these yoga toes for a few weeks now and let me tell you they are the best thing ever. I have had plantar fasciitis for two years and have tried everything. Stretches, custom insoles, bought chacos and birkenstocks for support. I've tried everything, but these have brought me such comfort! I have worn flat sandals a few times and never felt any pain walking around, when I usually do about twenty minutes in. If you haven't tried these, you need to! Love them! I started out with wearing them 15 minutes a day and have worked up to 25 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela P. Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Quickly decreased pain I was having in 4th and 5th toe.
customer_reviews.text: Quickly decreased pain I was having in 4th and 5th toe. The first few times I wore these I had a bit of discomfort in the toes that have been bothering me, but this was expected as I knew they needed correcting. After about the 4th use in about a week (when I do wear then, I do so for about an hour), they have become very comfortable any my problem toes feel about 70% better so far. Will keep up wearing them, and hopefully in another week or two my toes will be back to normal. Wish I would have bought these a year ago when my toe pain started.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: They're odd to say the least, but they're helping ...
customer_reviews.text: They're odd to say the least, but they're helping me fight off the start of a bunion on my right foot, so I'll take it. Note: Small size fits women's shoe sizes up to 11.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon D.

customer_reviews.title: There is a charge for returning item..
customer_reviews.text: When I received the Yoga Toes they were too large. So I returned them and purchased a smaller size. They had a return fee of $7.16. I will not purchase anything from them or recommend their product.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia B.

customer_reviews.title: Love 'em!
customer_reviews.text: I love these YogaToes!!! They came fast. I ordered them on Thursday and got them today, Saturday. I wear a size 7 1/2 or 8 (depending on the brand) and the size small fits perfectly. They're kind of sticky, and my dog's fur gets stuck on them, but it washes right off. I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alexei

customer_reviews.title: Value Yoga Toes to keep my feet healthy and pretty
customer_reviews.text: Ive purchase a few pair of the yoga toes, the first pair eventually disintegrated. They held up for quite a long time though. I use Yoga Toes every morning and evening especially after wearing high heel shoes. I also frequently use them while doing my stretches. I value my feet and want them to be and feel healthy and look pretty, no undesirable bumps or lumps. Also great when painting my toenails to provide space so my polish doesn't bump the next toe. Dual purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: must haves for flat feet!
customer_reviews.text: get these--they have all but resolved my planter fasciitis with just a few uses. the changes are so subtle you don't notice. just put them on, kick back with a cup of tea or wine and chat with a friend while the yogatoes work their magic. just a little bit of time goes a long way. totally worth the investment!!
customer_reviews.author: sj

customer_reviews.title: These little guys are everything and more!
customer_reviews.text: An after work must have for heel wearers!! I wear 4” pumps to work daily and these are now a part of my after work routine! No more foot cramps or achy arches.. I didn’t even imagine the benefits these things and I haven’t looked back! I’ve even recommend to a few friends who’ve gotten them! I just run them under water to make easier to put on and enjoy. My feet, legs and body feel so much better it’s insane!
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Looking for relief...
customer_reviews.text: I am still hoping these get easier to use. I have Morton's Neuroma in both feet and was looking for an option to the constant pain. A few reviews stated they eventually received a little relief from the Neuroma after using these. I'll take anything. They were correct. When first using them, they really start to hurt, until you can build up your toes resistance over several days. They are not easy to put on either. But with a quick rinse they slide on better. Looking for other easier (less messy) ways of getting these on, without using water or lotion? Still believing.
customer_reviews.author: LF

customer_reviews.title: My toes already look better after just a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: My toes already look better after just a few weeks! They were so curled over that you could only see the nails on the first two toes. While my other toes aren't straightq, I can see nails on four toes now instead of two. There is still a curve in my toes, but they are straighter than they were before
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decrease in foot discomfort & pain
customer_reviews.text: They are everything that I was told they would be. I wear them every night for at least half an hour and have experienced a huge decrease in foot discomfort from bunions & plantar fasciitis. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: ann pegoraro

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! I had bunion surgery four years ago and this year the pain came back in full force. I've used Yoga Toes for a week and a half and feet feel better already. I strongly recommend Yoga Toes!
customer_reviews.author: natalie turner

customer_reviews.title: ... oil to slide on effortlessly and your toes will love th extra massage and moisture
customer_reviews.text: Buy some massage oil to slide on effortlessly and your toes will love th extra massage and moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer W.

customer_reviews.title: Feels great once you have them on!
customer_reviews.text: I like these a lot! I'm watching a lot of TV during this Pandemic Time and taking a lot of walks. After my walk, I put these on while watching TV and it really relaxes my toes. They're a bit hard to put on at first but you get the hang of it. I almost wish they stretched them even more but this definitely relaxes the toes and makes them have more room between after you use the YogaToes. The type of soft rubbery plastic they use does attract dust and down but you can rinse them super easily though. Solid 4.5 star product!
customer_reviews.author: rookshawn

customer_reviews.title: Really effective Yoga Toes
customer_reviews.text: I have a bunion that means there is pressure from the second toe. I have a little neuropathy in my three middle toes of the same foot from the effects of chemotherapy. I LOVE my yoga toes. A few minutes with them on my feet and my feet are happy to do whatever walking is required of them all the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Julia B

customer_reviews.title: Corrective Benefit YogaToes.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing worse than a painful bunion bunching up my toes. YogaToes is very simply to wear while relaxing to obtain maximum benefit. It makes a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Black

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!
customer_reviews.text: I use them twice a day and love them!! After the first use I noticed a difference in how my toes appeared lengthened and stretched as well as cramped less! I walk in my home all day barefoot and exercise indoors barefoot, so my toes really began to feel it. The YogaToes have made a big difference in the appearance and feel of my toes!!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Start with 10 mins then go from there to wean in!
customer_reviews.text: If you wean into them it’s better, use for 10 mins the first day then double your time or wear until you have discomfort. They are amazing for hammer toes!
customer_reviews.author: Tess J

customer_reviews.title: Both my husband and I felt relief from plantar fasciitis ...
customer_reviews.text: Both my husband and I felt relief from plantar fasciitis almost immediately after using these just once. We had to increase time gradually, but they are working so well for us that we ordered a second pair so we could each have a pair.
customer_reviews.author: C. Barton

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical.. but these are incredible!!! Those years of dancing and heels manifest after a while. I wear my yoga toes for about 45-60 minutes most evenings. Pain is gone and inflammation down. I highly recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ainara Echanove

customer_reviews.title: Helping with my foot issues
customer_reviews.text: These really hurt initially (maybe a few days) but now usually I can wear them an hour. I stuck with it and built up time slowly. I’m not sure why but they really help. I’ve never gooan actual diagnosis for my feet but I’m all for using anything that makes them feel better
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Lazarus

customer_reviews.title: A true must have!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!! Helped with achey feet and leg cramps. Plus they are washable. Would recommend them to anyone who spends all day on their feet.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah G.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t feel any improvement
customer_reviews.text: These were a bit weird getting on but once on they felt pretty good. I have crooked toes and hoped these would help a little. Haven’t seen any improvement in the toes
customer_reviews.author: LostinSouthBama

customer_reviews.title: Great stretch
customer_reviews.text: Really helps stretching my foot. Makes it feel better. But it is made with a simi sticky material, so i wouldn't recommend walking around in them
customer_reviews.author: T. Arreygue

customer_reviews.title: Will stretch you
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Just could be a little more tapered between toes. My toes are a little small and these spread well but don’t get all the way down to the base of the toe.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Eh, maybe they work for others.
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell that these do anything for my feet. It is a little hard to get them in between all my toes. Once they are on, they are fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lillie17176

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these, my pain not only stopped but it felt as someone was massaging my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy Feet!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! I am truly impressed with my YogaToes. I am on my feet all day (and have flat feet) so that feeling of a nice stretch goes all the way up to my knees! Literally the first day I could feel muscles stretching and activating that I didn’t even know I had. In addition, the extra strength in my feet has helped me to even have better alignment and has helped with my pronation. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy W.

customer_reviews.title: They Do The Trick!
customer_reviews.text: These really do work. I have one foot that due to years of wearing sky high shoes my toes are not very straight and a couple had bumps in them. Well two weeks of wearing these - my foot looks like normal. Couldn't believe it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Meador

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I first saw Yoga Toes 15 years ago, and all I can do besides completely enjoying them is wonder why I put off buying them for so long. They are awesome, feel great to use, and are already working their magic. I love to dance and the workout that they give my toes feels amazing, soothing, stimulating, and relaxing all at the same time. After you put them on, work your toes, see what I mean. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Daria March

customer_reviews.title: I love using this after being on my feet all day
customer_reviews.text: I love using this after being on my feet all day! Taking it off after 30-45min feels so good. I love this product. And oddly enough, my cat likes to attack it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a womens 7 1/2 and these fit exactly as the picture shows. They are a soft rubber so they aren’t painful, and they provide the perfect amount of spacing to take pressure off your feet. Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Feels good
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to see if I could help my bunions, or at least prevent them from getting worse. I think the quality is great. It did have an aweful chemical smell at first, but that has now resolved. It does make my feet feel good after, I like how it stretches the toes. I wouldn't recommend walking with them in (ouch), but kick up your feet and relax. I wore them for about 30 minutes right away, but you may need to work your way up to this depending on what kind of foot problems you have.
customer_reviews.author: jostaze

customer_reviews.title: work great!
customer_reviews.text: I've seen a marked decrease in foot pain in only a few days. Did not have to wear 10-15 mins at a time as a trial and jumped straight into wearing for an hour or more. Even slept with them for a few hours and took off in the middle of the night.
customer_reviews.author: rae

customer_reviews.title: Loving these, I've had them about 2 weeks now ...
customer_reviews.text: Loving these, I've had them about 2 weeks now and they almost instantly helped alleviate the pain in my big toe joints. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Misty W.

customer_reviews.title: i wear them for an hour after running - so far so good!
customer_reviews.text: i inherited my bunions from my mom. thanks, mom/obama. these really seem to help with joint pain. i wear them for an hour after running - so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: R Lee

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I wear them everyday watching tv, they have made a big difference in my feet and they become more comfortable as you wear them more.
customer_reviews.author: R.H

customer_reviews.title: Good for temporary relief
customer_reviews.text: They feel good while they’re are on. But once they come off, toes go back to way they were before in a matter of minutes. But they still feel good after a long day on your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very serious product - it us tough enough to hold toes in place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've been wearing these for an hour a day and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing these for an hour a day and already see a difference! I'll post a before and after photo in a month or so.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Lacolla

customer_reviews.title: just as pic
customer_reviews.text: if you've ever used these before- these are just like any other. they get the job done
customer_reviews.author: Ali Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The product is great, good quality and open your fingers enough to feel the stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Claudiarulos

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was incredulous but they seem to be helping my metatarsal issues.
customer_reviews.author: Tuesday Cool

customer_reviews.title: I think they are worth giving a try before spending a ton on physical therapy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have all kinds of things going on with my feet so I thought I would give them a try. I did see a difference in just a couple uses. I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: bridgette burnett

customer_reviews.title: Yoga Toes offer a great toe stretch!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm using Yoga Toes at the suggestion of a friend. I have tingling and numbness caused by a neuroma on my left foot. She thought the stretching would be a good thing. And, yes, the stretching feels great!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Don’t really working
customer_reviews.text: They are not well fitting and slip off the toes.
customer_reviews.author: HtownRN

customer_reviews.title: Too good to be true
customer_reviews.text: I wear these constantly, but do not notice any difference of improvement of my overall foot health. It feels good to stretch but does not fix and pre existing problems
customer_reviews.author: Kate Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable in the beginning, need to give it time.
customer_reviews.text: These are good for feet , but have to wear over time. And they are uncomfortable at first.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Levinson

customer_reviews.title: This is my 4th pair--I wear them every morning for ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th pair--I wear them every morning for at least 1 hour. Trying to prevent the toe crippling that is part of my family history.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get them on. Too wide, too stiff. Gave them to my daughter and she likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Levine

customer_reviews.title: Not for small feet/toes
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 6.5 and the small was way too big. I could only get my big toe in a slot my other toes would not fit at all. I will be returning for another type that works for small feet/toes.
customer_reviews.author: S. COOK

customer_reviews.title: top 5 best purchase in my life
customer_reviews.text: love these! have bought several pairs as gifts too! relieves tension all the way up your back!
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses these every night and Says they help
customer_reviews.author: Mad dog

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These make my feet feel good when I use them. I need to use them more often.
customer_reviews.author: X. Winters

customer_reviews.title: my toes are small so they get a good stretch. I wish I could sleep in them
customer_reviews.text: I have used them but cant really walk around with them on or put covers on over them .my toes are small so they get a good stretch. I wish I could sleep in them .but so far so good
customer_reviews.author: cynthia g.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Sore, Athletic Feet
customer_reviews.text: I bought these when I ran decent distances and my feet were sore. These days I practice and teach yoga but I LOVE these. They feel weird at first. Listen to the instructions, use them 20 minutes at a time. Expect a bit of soreness in the beginning, but in a good way. They really do make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Kalas

customer_reviews.title: I love my yoga toes I go to sleep with them ...
customer_reviews.text: I love my yoga toes I go to sleep with them every single night. Its a great stretch for your toes and they fit perfectly! I wear a medium and I'm a size 9!
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: These are great, but they fall off when you walk around
customer_reviews.text: These are great, but they fall off when you walk around. I don't know how the product could change to stay on your feel, but I thought the point was to train the muscles when you walk. I still think they help in the long run for hammer toe, bunions, and in my case Turf Toe pain.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: I really love these and use them daily to strengthening my feet ...
customer_reviews.text: I really love these and use them daily to strengthening my feet and feel relief from long runs. I'v been using YogaToes for many years now.
customer_reviews.author: UltraTrailRunner

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: My mom has bad arthritis in her feet, and this product has definitely helped.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to put on.
customer_reviews.text: These yoga toes are difficult to put on. This is only the 3rd day I’ve used them. I bought them to correct my hammertoes and bunions. Too soon to tell if they work.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Clements

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I'm hoping that after a while my toes ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I'm hoping that after a while my toes will straighten to avoid further damage to my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Moho

customer_reviews.title: They bruised my toes
customer_reviews.text: My foot doctor recommended the Yoga Toes to perhaps correct some crooked toes issues instead of surgery. By the way surgery does not work for hammertoes I had that done too a few years ago. The Yoga Toes are not meant for people who have had foot surgery in their past. I tried the Yoga Toes over a period of two months had bruising show up each month. It would take weeks to get over the bruising plus had to limit walking for exercise until the bruising healed, etc. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: way to stiff and bulky so why bother with this product!
customer_reviews.text: These toe separators are the worlds worst - do not buy them. They are so stiff they hurt to have on your feet for even a short time. There is no way you could sleep in them.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Love These!
customer_reviews.text: After walking or standing in heels all day, there are some days my feet just hurt. I come home, put these on for about 10 - 15 minutes and my feet feel GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy coming home to my Yoga Toes.
customer_reviews.text: Yoga Toes feel wonderful after a day wearing heels. They really stretch my toes and I can feel the pressure being removed from my feet. I love Yoga Toes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Just got these, can't tell if they are working yet, but after wearing them for 10 minutes i am able to walk better after long hikes than i was before, so i think they are good so far.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Levin

customer_reviews.title: Terrific!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It really does what it claims to do! I have been using it for about two weeks to straighten out hammertoes, and I see an improvement already. Yea!
customer_reviews.author: Jan M.

customer_reviews.title: Love these, no more foot cramps.
customer_reviews.text: Use these daily after work. Slip them on while I do my meditation and get the benefits of a foot stretch and my "mindful time" Great way to wind down after busy ER shift on my feet. No more foot cramps.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Yoga Toes make my feet quite happy. I recommend them to all my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Sy

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The product is not meant for small and medium feet. Very uncomfortable. The seller should have multiple size for this product or atleast let the customers know so that we dont waste 40 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Puneet Kumar

customer_reviews.title: The sizing is off. The description says they are ...
customer_reviews.text: The sizing is off. The description says they are small for women's size 7.5-11 but when I got the yoga toes in the mail, the packaging said size 6-9. Unfortunately, they were for someone that is a size 10 :(
customer_reviews.author: Kari Asadorian

customer_reviews.title: relief
customer_reviews.text: these make my feet and tendons feel so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Douglas

customer_reviews.title: love them
customer_reviews.text: I use my yogatoes every day and hope that I will notice a difference soon...
customer_reviews.author: Janis Veillette

customer_reviews.title: Help reduce swelling
customer_reviews.text: I recently had foot surgery and my recovering foot is less swollen after I use these. I put them on both feet for good measure, and am really glad I followed my pedicurist's recommendation to buy them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for feet
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to get on but they really help my foot problems.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Caused more pain than relief
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know if it’s my feet or product problem but after wearing in bed would wake up within an hour or two in excruciating agony
customer_reviews.author: Fiona Houghton

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions completely. After several times of use, my toes hurt so badly that I gave up.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I returned these right away because they would not stay on my toes!
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these.. Work great to straighten out one of my toes!!!
customer_reviews.author: S. W.

customer_reviews.title: Not my cup of tea
customer_reviews.text: Might work for some people but too large to fit through my little toe and painful. It has been broken and just won't stretch.
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Well fitting and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I'm not yet sure of the long-term benefits, but at the start, these fit well, and they're comfortable. I wear them for about 15-45 minutes a day, either in bed right before sleep, or sometimes during the day when I'm working from home. They do make my feet feel refreshed, and I'm hoping to see a reduction in my bunions over time.
customer_reviews.author: Shari C

customer_reviews.title: The size was perfect
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it says.... The size was perfect 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Kanna

customer_reviews.title: These hurt like hell when you have them on
customer_reviews.text: These hurt like hell when you have them on. I try to sleep in them, but I wake up uncomfortable. I guess my feet aren't made for these.
customer_reviews.author: J. Zackery

customer_reviews.title: Love these and how they make my feet relax
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have! Love these and how they make my feet relax. Great for preventive issues. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: eliza

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love them... they have improved my balance, relieve pain/stress, & they are very durable.
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER E MUEHLE

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: After being on my feet for 8 hours a day, it's such a pleasure to put these on. My feet seem to be very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Dayversity

customer_reviews.title: Works as decribed
customer_reviews.text: Im not good about using them as often as I'd like, but they work well when I do use them.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy S.

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Fast Delivery. Size fits. Love the cooling effect. Makes my toes feel much better after use Great product. Use them daily after a workout.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Davis

customer_reviews.title: So Good
customer_reviews.text: My feet have diabetic nerve pain, plantar fasciitis and tendon issues. I do have other treatments I use but I just added yoga toes to my routine. Im so glad I did! These truly help me not have cramps in my feet. I had some pain on the top of my foot and after a couple of sessions with these, the pain was gone. It gives a good stretch and it feels wonderful once you take them off. Like your feet are re-energized. I had these a week and then purchased a 2nd pair for a friend who is on her feet all day. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Witchtrials

customer_reviews.title: If you have Bunion pain, USE THIS
customer_reviews.text: Helps relieve my bunion pain. Had bunion surgery and have to retain my muscles, works better than the cloth contraption the podiatrist provided.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome....Helping my bunions and already correcting toes after a week of use. highly recommended.
